senses.sense_definition: A payment or action provided to compensate for a wrong, injury, or damage done to someone; often used in the plural regarding payments after a war.

examples.text: The defeated country was required to pay heavy war <w>reparations</w> to the victors.
He tried to make <w>reparation</w> for his mistake by offering to fix the damage himself.

senses.sense_definition: The act of repairing or restoring something to a good condition.

examples.text: The <w>reparation</w> of the ancient cathedral will require significant funding and expertise.
Local authorities are responsible for the <w>reparation</w> of roads damaged by the storm.
